Unnamed: 6: SASB EM-MM-510a | Production in countries that have the 20 lowest rankings in Transparency International's Corruption Perception Index

MinRes does not operate in any of the countries designated among the 20 lowest rankings in the 2022 Transparency International Corruption Perception Index (TICPI). All of our operations and mineral production is in Australia, which is ranked 13 in the TICPI. Refer to the map below.

Transparency International's lowest 20 countries (ranked 161-180) for 2022 include: Eritrea, Sudan, Congo, Guinea-Bissau, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Chad, Comoros, Nicaragua, Turkmenistan, Burundi, Equatorial Guinea, Haiti, North Korea, Libya, Yemen, Venezuela, South Sudan, Syria and Somalia.\n \nSource: https://www.transparency.org/en/cpi/2022
